quotes.quote: Difficulty creates the opportunity for self-reflection and compassion.
Every difficulty slurred over will be a ghost to disturb your repose later on.
Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
The difficulty we have in accepting responsibility for our behavior lies in the desire to avoid the pain of the consequences of that behavior.
Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.
Difficulty is the nurse of greatness.
A difficulty is a light. An insurmountable difficulty is a sun.
Every difficulty draws us toward a higher power than ourselves.
The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones.
The greatest difficulty with the world is not its ability to produce, but the unwillingness to share.
The greatest difficulty always comes right before the birth of a dream.
Difficulty is what wakes up the genius.
Difficulty comes not only because of your mistakes, but once you try to make an excuse or accuse someone else, your mind stops thinking.
The difficulty with any sort of esteem is that more is expected of you.
Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
Difficulty is one of the prices that we pay for our blessings.
Life must pass through difficulty in order to achieve any modicum of beauty.
The difficulty for most of us in the modern world is that the old-fashioned idea of God has become incredible or implausible.
The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for.
The apprenticeship of difficulty is one which the greatest of men have had to serve.
The difficulty is not making a decision, it's living with the consequences.
Difficulty shows what men are.
Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts.
When you are face to face with a difficulty, you are up against a discovery.
Every difficulty requires new strategy to overcome it.
Difficulty is inevitable. Drama is a choice.
Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
Difficulty attracts the man of character because it is in embracing it that he realizes himself.
The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
Facing a difficulty requires a willingness of heart.
There is no difficulty that enough love will not conquer.
You gain strength with every difficulty, which you boldly overcome.
Difficulty is our most reliable narrative engine.
The difficulty is to try and teach the multitude that something can be true and untrue at the same time.
The difficulty is that we try to perfect others before we perfect ourselves.
It is only when a person gets into difficulty that one can truly see his heart.
You have to push through every difficulty to achieve the goal.
People seem to sometimes have a difficulty drawing that line between the character and the person.
The difficulty is not to write, but to write what you mean.
It is not the path which is the difficulty; rather, it is the difficulty which is the path.
The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself. If we don't have that we never grow, we never learn, and sure as hell we should never teach.
Almost any difficulty will move in the face of honesty. When I am honest I never feel stupid. And when I am honest I am automatically humble.
A difficulty journey is more revealing of character than any discussion or analysis.
Every difficulty is an opportunity for personal growth.
Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
Where there is no difficulty there is no praise.
The difficulty is to know conscience from self-interest.

If most people are not willing to see the difficulty, this is mainly because, consciously or unconsciously, they assume that it will be they who will settle these questions for the others, and because they are convinced of their own capacity to do this.
